channel.title: CVE Feed for Interaction Design Team at the University of Applied Sciences and Arts in Hildesheim/Germany -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Interaction Design Team at the University of Applied Sciences and Arts in Hildesheim/Germany -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-25975|2024-06-06T14:49:52.060Z -- interaction%20design%20team%20at%20the%20university%20of%20applied%20sciences%20and%20arts%20in%20hildesheim%2Fgermany -- hawki
item.description: The application implements an up- and downvote function which alters a value within a JSON file. The POST parameters are not filtered properly and therefore an arbitrary file can be overwritten. The file can be controlled by an authenticated attacker, the content cannot be controlled. It is possible to overwrite all files for which the webserver has write access. It is required to supply a relative path (path traversal).

item.title: CVE-2024-25977|2024-05-29T13:14:24.249Z -- interaction%20design%20team%20at%20the%20university%20of%20applied%20sciences%20and%20arts%20in%20hildesheim%2Fgermany -- hawki
item.description: The application does not change the session token when using the login or logout functionality. An attacker can set a session token in the victim's browser (e.g. via XSS) and prompt the victim to log in (e.g. via a redirect to the login page). This results in the victim's account being taken over.
